entry.name: callbacks.remove
entry.title: callbacks.remove()

argument.name: callbacks
argument.desc: A function, or array of functions, that are to be removed from the callback list.

entry.desc: Remove a callback or a collection of callbacks from a callback list.

longdesc.p: This method returns the Callbacks object onto which it is attached (this).

example.desc: Use callbacks.remove() to remove callbacks from a callback list:
